summary: Get in the Festive Spirit with this hat.
descriptionHtml:
Festive Hat Reskin
By Fr0z3n (aka nightsfrost)

---INSTALLATION---
To install, place the accompanying data folder into steamapps/common/skyrim
Press yes, you want to merge.

---UNISNTALLATION---
To uninstall, just go to steamapps/common/skyrim/data/textures/armor and remove the fineclothings folder. This is a clean uninstall.  ***This is wrong in the readme, it says ebony armor. Thats what I get for copy/pasteing...***

Do no redistribute, without permission, etc. etc.


Happy Holidays!
author: nightsfrost
